challenges.title: Offer a compliment
challenges.author: Julie
challenges.description: A simple compliment can make all the differnce to someone's day, and their state of mind. Take a minute and pay somebody one. It's free!

challenges.title: Be a phone charger
challenges.author: Liz
challenges.description: If you have an open door and an extension lead, help your neighbours keep topped up.

challenges.title: Language Exchange
challenges.author: Frank
challenges.description: Teach someone in need basic english

challenges.title: Food Drive

challenges.description: FOod drive for Syrian Refuggees at your local supermarket

challenges.title: Code for Change
challenges.author: Lee
challenges.description: UNICEF need help coding this section of there website by Sept.28th

challenges.title: Cook for Foodcycle
challenges.author: Jeff
challenges.description: We need 10 cooks to help with Foodcycle breakfast service for Syrian refugees. No experiance needed.

challenges.title: Help out at a Refugee Camp
challenges.author: Red Cross
challenges.description: Any and all help needed at the RED CROSS Beirut Refugee. Everything from laundrey and food to medical help welcome.

challenges.title: Donate 10$ to UN Syrian Relief fund

challenges.description: Donate 10$ to UN Syrian Relief fund

challenges.title: Red Cross Clothes drive
challenges.author: Florence
challenges.description: Clear out your wardrobe, donate your old clothes to the Red Cross. COllection day nation wide wednesday

challenges.title: Uber Food and Clothes Challenge
challenges.author: Uber
challenges.description: Uber is running a FOod and Clothes Challenge for the Syrian Refuges, they will come collect FROM, just click this link and set up a time and collection spot.

challenges.title: Give a haircut
challenges.author: Vicki
challenges.description: We're getting a crack team of stylists down to dover to help raise spirits. A haircut can make you feel better.
